DOC.detailed_description: Physical fitness evaluate six different physical test : 1. agility T test , 2 . `` shuttle run '' test aerobic capacity , 3. vertical jump , 4. power ball throw , 5 . `` sit reach '' flexibility test , 6 . 20 all-out run speed test .
